name: DataJConf
description: European Data and Computational Journalism Conference

scripts.reinstall: rimraf node_modules && npm cache clean && npm install
scripts.build:css:prod: node-sass src/scss/index.scss -x --output-style compressed | postcss -u autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' -u cssnano --no-map > dist/css/app.css
scripts.build:critical:prod: critical dist/index.html --inline --minify --base dist > tmp/index.html && cp tmp/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.mkdirs: mkdir -p dist/js && mkdir -p dist/css && mkdir -p dist/img && mkdir -p tmp
scripts.copy: npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:html
scripts.prebuild:dev: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run copy
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:css:dev && npm run build:js:dev && npm run build:images
scripts.prebuild:prod: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run copy
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:css:prod && npm run build:js:prod && npm run build:images && npm run build:critical:prod
scripts.kill: lsof -n -i:8080 | grep LISTEN | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:html' 'npm run watch:assets' 'npm run watch:img'

author: Martin Chorley
